keyMoments.title: Coated Paddle Ship Surfaces
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard's hidden coated paddle ship surfaces from the bay as his trump card.
keyMoments.significance: The ship's coating allows it to travel underwater undetected, enabling the pirates to bypass Marine defenses.

keyMoments.title: Ship Propelled into Plaza
keyMoments.description: Oars Jr. propels the coated paddle ship into the plaza, carrying the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The ship serves as the vehicle that allows the pirates to breach the plaza successfully.
